servizi_title: Comfort and Relax at Your Fingertips
serv_wifi_desc: Stay connected easily during your stay.
serv_centro_desc: Reach the heart of the city in just a 3-minute walk.
serv_ac_desc: Fresh and comfortable environments in every season.
serv_kitchen_desc: Everything you need to prepare your favorite meals.
serv_beds_desc: Accommodates up to five people in spacious rooms.
serv_beach_desc: Golden beach just a few steps from the house.
prezzi_disclaimer: To check available dates and book, fill out the form in the Contact section.
calendar_sub: Dates marked in red are unavailable.
about_p1: Hi! We are Riccardo and Maria. We renovated 'Perla Bianca' thinking exactly about what we look for when we travel: impeccable cleanliness, modern comforts, and the warmth only a real home can give.
about_p2: We are in love with our city and will be happy to recommend the best restaurants and hidden beaches.
footer_desc: Your oasis of relaxation just steps from the sea. Book your dream vacation independently today.
cookie_text: We use technical cookies to ensure the best experience. By continuing to browse, you accept the use of cookies.
404_text: It seems this room doesn't exist in our holiday home.
review_form_subtitle: We hope you had an unforgettable stay.
review_placeholder_message: What did you like the most? Would you recommend the house?
js_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
js_calendar_req: Hi, I would like to ask for availability for the day
js_calendar_prompt: Scroll to contact form to send request.
cal_req_msg_start: Hi, I would like to ask for availability from
faq_checkin_q: What are the Check-in and Check-out times?
faq_checkin_a: Check-in is available from 3:00 PM onwards (we often offer self check-in). Check-out is required by 10:00 AM to allow for cleaning.
faq_linen_q: Do you provide bed linen and towels?
faq_linen_a: Yes, we provide a complete set of bed linen and towels for each guest upon arrival.
faq_parking_a: Yes, there is free street parking right in front of the property and in adjacent streets.
guide_promo: Want to discover the best restaurants and secret beaches?
guide_link: Ask us for our local guide after booking!
review_star_required: Please select a star rating before continuing.
review_date_order: Departure date must be after the arrival date.
